name: Five Night's At Freddy's 4 RCTD DEMO
name_original: Five Night's At Freddy's 4 RCTD DEMO
description:
English:

What happened in the past of all the events and murders.

Find out in this 4 game from the hit franchise.

In this game you will be playing as Michael Afton,

Discovering the secrets of his disturbing and dark past,

along with your mistakes.

Welcome to FNaF 4 Where terror and darkness hide

your past and your fears in the form of nightmares.

Português:

O que houve no passado de todos os acontecimentos e assassinatos.

Descubra isso neste 4 jogo da franquia de sucesso.

Neste jogo você estará jogando na pele de Michael Afton,

Descobrindo os segredos de seu passado perturbador e obscuro,

junto aos seus erros cometidos.

Seja Bem-Vindo a FNaF 4 Onde o terror e a escuridão, esconde

seu passado e seus medos em forma de pesadelos.

Credits:

Textures By Scott Cawthon.

Programming/Logic By KatePrises.

Additional Story By KatePrises.

Music/Sound Effects By LeonRisk.

This Game is copyrighted by Scott Cawthon.

Five Night's At Freddy's is a registered trademark of Scott Cawthon.

Trailer in Portuguese Voiced/Translated By KatePrises.

Trailer in English By Scott Cawthon.

Additional Textures By KatePrises.

Language in Portuguese By KatePrises.

Language in English By Scott Cawthon.

Participating Channels:

Music Dream Your Dream In Portuguese By Jimmy Maximus.

Music Dream Your Dream Original Female Version By TryHardNinja And LUNITY.

Final credits:

Added Controls Support.

Thanks to everyone who played this FanGame full version,

It will be out October 31st.

Thanks to everyone in the FNaF community, you guys are awesome.

See you all soon.

Créditos:

Obrigado a todos que jogaram está Fan Game a versão completa,

sairá dia 31 de outubro.

Obrigado a todos da comunidade de FNaF vocês são demais.

Vejo todos em breve.
